  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Two points of a Ltd Qty label printed on the manufacturer's carton are sticking out from behind the shipper's barcode/shipping label and "LTD QTY REQUIRED" printed on barcode/label - no other markings on pkg. Contents are 6 x 13 oz. metal aerosol cans of paint/primer. Pressurized contents will be repacked as prescribed.
